sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext } from 'react'
import { StyleSheet, Text, View, TextInput, TouchableOpacity, useWindowDimensions } from 'react-native'

export default function CreateRoomScreen() {

    const { width, height } = useWindowDimensions()
    const styles = StyleSheet.create({
        CreateRoomContainer: {
            flex: 1,
            flexDirection: 'column',
            justifyContent: 'flex-start',
            alignItems: 'center',
            width: 400,
            height: 400,
            borderRadius: 10,
            backgroundColor: '#fff',
            position: 'absolute',
            top: height/2 - 200,
            left: width/2 -200,
            zIndex: 100
        },
        CreateRoomTitle: {
            fontSize: 20,
            marginTop: 20,
            marginBottom: 30,
            zIndex: 100,
            color: '#fff'
        },
        DarkOverlay: {
            flex: 1,
            flexDirection: 'column',
            justifyContent: 'flex-start',
            alignItems: 'center',
            width: width,
            height: height,
            borderRadius: 10,
            backgroundColor: '#0b2946',
            position: 'absolute',
            top: 0,
            left: 0,
            zIndex: 50,
            opacity: 0.8
        }

    })
    return (

        <View style={styles.DarkOverlay}>
            <View style={styles.CreateRoomContainer}>
                <Text style={styles.CreateRoomTitle}>Create a new room</Text>
                <TextInput placeholder='Enter the name of the new room'></TextInput>
                <TouchableOpacity>
                    <Text>Create Room</Text>
                </TouchableOpacity>
            </View>

        </View>
    )
}
